node.excerpt:
Human Evolution is the first design from the We are Animals I series, a series of 
pieces portraying great minds wronged by humanity’s thoughts. This piece shows Charles 
Darwin. The English naturalist, known for his proposition that all species of life have 
descended over time from common…

frontmatter.title: Human Evolution
frontmatter.description: This piece shows Charles Darwin. The English naturalist, known for his revolutionary proposition that all species of life have descended over time from common ancestors.
